content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 (750 milliliter) bottle 190 proof grain alcohol" )

content.text: 0) In a large pot, combine apple juice, apple cider, sugar and cinnamon sticks.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@19:26 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "apple juice"@27:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "apple cider"@40:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "sugar"@53:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "cinnamon sticks"@63:78 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large pot"@6:17 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Bring to a boil, then remove from heat and let cool completely.
2) When juice mixture is cool, stir in the grain alcohol.
